results.title: Simvastatin retards progression of retinopathy in diabetic patients with hypercholesterolemia.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Neuronopathy_Distal_Hereditary_Motor_Type_V</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563443 @@@VA@@@ improved in four @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ using @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, (not statistically different from placebo group) and worsening of @<m>DISEASE_Neuronopathy_Distal_Hereditary_Motor_Type_V</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563443 @@@VA@@@ occurred in seven @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the placebo group and none in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group (P = 0.009).

citations.NLM: Sen K, Misra A, Kumar A, Pandey RM. Simvastatin retards progression of retinopathy in diabetic patients with hypercholesterolemia. Diabetes Res Clin Pract. 2002 Apr;56(1):1-11. PMID: 11879715
